name: monarchically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to or is suitable for a king or queen, or that relates to a monarchy: Some of the leaders acted monarchically, but said they supported the republic. It was difficult to act against the monarch in a monarchically organized society. They wished to weaken the power of the monarchically ruled territories.
More examplesFewer examplesTheir state was organized democratically rather than monarchically.It was agreed that both the state and the church would be governed monarchically. At that time, many states in the region had ceased to be monarchically governed.
